artist: Artist: Migita Toshihide; Publisher: Matsuno Yonejirō
creditline: Gift from the collection of Edith and the late John Payne
description: vertical ōban triptych; triptych forming a single image; group of solders wearing white coats with black sashes and red and black hats, on left of image; red and white striped flag waves, with two commanding solders in black coats raise swords in air; large plume of smoke in center; soldiers attacking a group of figures on right, who are barefooted and wear simple smocks in green, red, brown and yellow pigments; faint view of figures in URQ, holding raised flag and are slightly obscured by smoke
inscription: on left sheet, on back, in LLQ, in pencil: T.8.C | on center sheet, on cack, in ULC, in pencil: DRE | on right sheet, in ULC, in pencil: T:8E
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: Imperial Guards Crushing the Enemy Army in a Hard Fight at Keelung on the Island of Taiwan
